title: FPS Stuttering! FPS and ping is fine, but champ stutters
body: Hello everyone i have an Intel i7 4790K Processor 4Ghz, G1 Nvidia GTX 980 Graphics Card 4GB, Corsair Vengeance 8gb 2133mhz overclocked memory. I should have no problems running league at max settings, however, I stutter whenever i leave my FPS uncapped. In game at max settings i will get 600 FPS at beginning going into 300 FPS during laning and 250 during team fights but i "stutter" every 5 seconds! The only thing that seems to fix this "stutter" is when i set my FPS cap at 144 but every now and then i glitch. Does anyone else experience a similar issue and if so how did you fix it?

replies.body:
Hey GeorgeDubayaBush, 

If that didn't help the issue  you should write into Riots Tech Support and ask for a little extra help. They should be able to get this taken care of with you :) 

Riot Support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Good luck buddy! Hope to see you in the Rift soon :) 

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}

Thank you very much! I will reach out to them after troubleshooting this issue by adjusting and configuring monitor settings and such. I reset my overclocked RAM to default, and the game runs ALOT better now but it still hops/anti-aliasing every now and then. the good news is that i dont have to run VSYNC or cap my FPS now to even play.

Hey GeorgeDubayaBush, 

I read over your post and you're right, you shouldn't be having any issue running league at max settings. You may want to look into Riots FPS KB, it should fix you up so you don't have these issues anymore. Make sure to follow the steps and if you have any issues reach out to me :) 

FPS KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting




{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-rainbows}}
thank you! so now i am running at 144 FPS but that is WITH vertical Sync on, if i remove VSync, then my FPS goes back to 600 and i start stuttering/hopping again. Any other suggestions?
I am running uncapped at 144 FPS but that is with VSyn turned ON. I really wish to be running at like 200+Fps  WITHOUT Vsync
